fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Document about a player each night, their visitors will be kept on a list you can't see normally.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you get 3 or more names, your list is instantly cleared and you learn all the names, you can learn the same name multiple times.
- If you have 0 names stored and would see 3 or more visitors in one night, you will learn the place was too crowded and your ability fails.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
